column1: With this growth has come greater interconnectedness and complexity in intermediation chains.

In my view, one of the most significant findings r elates to MMFs.  The Holistic Review documented how the extremely high demand for liquidity, combined with a flight -tosafety, triggered a “ dash for cash” that hit institutional prime money market funds particularly hard.

Conclusion  We faced a confluence of events over the past year that demanded international coordination in several key areas, and that is precisely why the FSB was created more than ten years ago ; a beacon at the end of another fateful March.
